items.title: You Don't Know JS Yet
items.description: The 2nd edition of the book series is out. Definetly woth to check it out.

items.title: Vanilla Web Projects
items.description: A list of 20 projects by Brad Traversy, which are build without frameworks or libraries.

items.title: ESLint configuration and best practices
items.description: A nice post by Lucas Santoni about the best practices of eslint.

items.title: 24 modern ES6 code snippets to solve practical JS problems
items.description: A cool collection of snippets by Madza on dev.to.

items.title: iHateRegex
items.description: A list of commonly used regular expressions - a usefull cheatsheet.

items.title: Image Dragging Effects
items.description: A set of cool dragging effects by Mary Lou from Codrops.

items.title: Old CSS, new CSS
items.description: A good read about how CSS used to work and where we are now.

items.title: Scene.js
items.description: An animation library. for creatin animated websites.

items.title: CesiumJS
items.description: An open source JavaScript library for creating 3D globes and maps.

items.title: React Kawaii
items.description: A library of cute illustrations, which are also easily customisable.

items.title: Intrinsic Sizing In CSS
items.description: An article by Ahmad Shadeed about extrinsic and intrisic sizing.
